body_html:
@Andrew-Zhu You can find a built wheel for 47c0d88 here (torch-1.0.0a0+47c0d88-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl) for Python 3.6 and pip3 install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing is needed :)

I installed CUDA10 and built your pytorch wheel(torch-1.0.0a0+47c0d88-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl). After finished that, I tryed to import torch but reported Error, this:

import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "/home/pc/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 84, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: libmkl_intel_lp64.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

could you tell me why? Thanks very much!
body_text:
@Andrew-Zhu You can find a built wheel for 47c0d88 here (torch-1.0.0a0+47c0d88-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl) for Python 3.6 and pip3 install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing is needed :)

I installed CUDA10 and built your pytorch wheel(torch-1.0.0a0+47c0d88-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl). After finished that, I tryed to import torch but reported Error, this:



import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in 
File "/home/pc/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 84, in 
from torch._C import *
ImportError: libmkl_intel_lp64.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory



could you tell me why? Thanks very much!
body:
> @Andrew-Zhu You can find a built wheel for [47c0d88](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/47c0d88739c6ba0f98614a7f544695504e5cfedb) [here](https://schweter.eu/cloud/torch-1.0.0a0+47c0d88-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl) (torch-1.0.0a0+47c0d88-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl) for Python 3.6 and `pip3 install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing` is needed :)

I installed CUDA10 and built your pytorch wheel(torch-1.0.0a0+47c0d88-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl). After finished that, I tryed to import torch but reported Error, this: 
>>> import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/pc/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 84, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: libmkl_intel_lp64.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

could you tell me why? Thanks very much!
